Assuming we remove these repeated error messages, here's the cleaned-up paragraph with Fluid expressions annotated:

---

**Original Paragraph:**
BPE and character systems differ most in the "C:\Users\Alfy\Lavoro\bristol\transp-text-new\node_modules\.bin\fluid" non è riconosciuto come comando interno o esterno, of lexical choice errors, and in the "C:\Users\Alfy\Lavoro\bristol\transp-text-new\node_modules\.bin\fluid" non è riconosciuto come comando interno o esterno, to which they drop content. Regarding lexical choice, the two systems differ not only in the "C:\Users\Alfy\Lavoro\bristol\transp-text-new\node_modules\.bin\fluid" non è riconosciuto come comando interno o esterno, of errors, but in the nature of those errors. In particular, the BPE model had "C:\Users\Alfy\Lavoro\bristol\transp-text-new\node_modules\.bin\fluid" non è riconosciuto come comando interno o esterno, trouble handling German compound nouns. We also found that both systems occasionally mistranslate proper names.
